description: This file contains mock implementations and extern function definitions for testing system call wrappers (system, unlink, access, v_secure_system, etc.) using a global mock object. It is used for unit testing and mocking system interactions within the project.

methods.name: int system(const char * cmd)
methods.description: Externally defined wrapper that calls the mock's system method.

methods.name: int unlink(const char * str)
methods.description: Externally defined wrapper that calls the mock's unlink method.

methods.name: int access(const char * pathname,int mode)
methods.description: Externally defined wrapper that calls the mock's access method.

methods.name: int vsnprintf(char * str,size_t size,const char * format,va_list ap)
methods.description: Externally defined wrapper for vsnprintf, calls mock's method.

methods.name: int remove(const char * pathname)
methods.description: Externally defined wrapper that calls the mock's remove method.

methods.name: int v_secure_system(const char * cmd,...)
methods.description: Wrapper that formats command string using va_list, then calls mock's v_secure_system method.

ctags.name: access
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int access(const char * pathname, int mode)$/

ctags.name: vsnprintf
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int vsnprintf(char* str, size_t size, const char* format, va_list ap)$/
